selection_reason: Ankit Verma is a strong match for the Application Testing Engineer role. He possesses all the must-have technical skills, including manual and automation testing, Selenium, JIRA, Postman, and SQL queries. His 3 years of experience in application testing, including functional, regression, and API testing, align well with the job requirements. Additionally, his ISTQB certification and experience with Agile/Scrum and CI/CD pipelines add value to his profile. While there is a minor risk due to the lack of explicitly stated soft skills and missing location details, his technical expertise and growth potential outweigh these concerns. Overall, he is a reliable and competent candidate with room for further growth in the role.

Responsibilities: Designed and executed test cases for web and mobile apps.
Automated regression test cases using Selenium WebDriver.
Validated APIs using Postman and automated test scripts.
Worked closely with developers to resolve defects in Agile sprints.
Conducted functional and regression testing on enterprise apps.
Prepared test plans and detailed bug reports.
